#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        int l1,l2;
        l1=a.length();
        l2=b.length();
        if(l1<l2)
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
        else
        {
            int i,j,k,l;
            for(l=0;l<l1;l++)
            {
                k=0,j=0;
                for(i=l;i<l1 && j<l2 ;i++)
                {
                    if(a[i]==b[j])
                    {
                        k++;
                        j++;
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if(k==l2)
                    break;
            }
            if(k==l2)
                cout<<"1"<<endl;
            else
                cout<<"0"<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
